GuideContent.title: Introduction
GuideContent.description: Teardown Walkthrough is a guide app for Teardown game , it will help you to know everything about the teardown game.you will find many tricks and walkthroughs. moreover, in this guide, you will discover how to complete all the teardown levels in the easiest way.

GuideContent.title: Note
GuideContent.description: This Teardown beginnerâ€™s guide will teach you some tips and tricks that will help you optimise your heists better.

GuideContent.title: The basics
GuideContent.description: the teardown game guide contains many useful hidden secrets and many more to break down all stages & missions of this game in order to use it toward your advantage, written by a fan, perfect for beginners and intermediate players.

GuideContent.title: About This Game
GuideContent.description: plan the perfect heist using creative problem solving, brute force, and everything around you. teardown features a fully destructible and truly interactive environment

GuideContent.title: Saving builds and Clearing objects
GuideContent.description: You can save and paste builds. Saved builds can be pasted at any time, including in different game sessions, and as many times as you want.To save builds, click and hold down on the screen and drag to create a green box.
